name: Tough
desperateActions: When you would take more than 1 Wound from a single attack, you may reduce it to 1.

name: Slayer
benefits: Gain Advantage to Fighting and Archery Skill Checks made against Risen.
reactions: If more than two Risen make Fighting Skill Checks against you in a round, you may attack an Adjacent Risen with your Fighting or Archery Skill Check.
desperateActions: Make a Fighting or Archery Skill Check against a Risen.

name: Berserker
benefits: After you receive a Wound that would result in yor death, you may make a Strength Check (CR 10). If successful, you do not die but heal 1 Wound instead. Increase the CR by 5 each subsequent time the Check is made. A Rest returns the CR to 10.

name: Willful
benefits: If you have 4 or more Mind, gain 1 more Vitality.

name: Agile

buffs.attribute: Chance of Major Wounds while unarmored

reactions: If you Wound an unwounded Character, you may attack them again with a Fighting Skill Check.
